word_mean: 口：开口或孔，特指消化管道前端或近侧开口，前方以唇为界，含有舌和齿

sentence.Network_en: A thorough brushing helps to freshen up your mouth.
sentence.Network_cn: 彻底刷牙有助于口气清新。

sentence.Network_en: His mouth was a little open, as if he'd started to scream.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的嘴微微张开,似乎是要开始尖叫.

sentence.Network_en: I've always had a loud mouth, I refuse to be silenced.
sentence.Network_cn: 我一贯大声说出自己的想法，不会迫于压力而一言不发。

jx.jx_en_mean: To express one's opinions or complaints in a loud, indiscreet manner.
a person, typically a child, who has to be looked after and fed
(informal)tend to talk boastfully without any intention of acting on one's words
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)只说不作；干打雷不下雨

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)not say anything, especially not reveal a secret

lj.lj_ly: would he keep his mouth shut under interrogation?.
lj.lj_ls: 审讯时他会守口如瓶吗？。

lj.lj_ly: sorry, I'll never open my mouth about you again.
lj.lj_ls: 对不起，以后我再也不说有关你的话了。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)talk in an unpleasantly loud and boastful or opinionated way
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)自吹自擂毫无顾忌地高声谈论；固执己见地高谈阔论

lj.lj_ly: he was mouthing off about society in general.
lj.lj_ls: 他正就整个社会高谈阔论。

means.word_mean: 傲慢,鲁莽,粗鲁,厚颜无耻

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English mūth, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch mond and German Mund, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin mentum 'chin'

entry.def: Your mouth is the area of your face where your lips are or the space behind your lips where your teeth and tongue are.

example.ex: She clamped her hand against her mouth...
His mouth was full of peas.

entry.def: You can say that someone has a particular kind of mouth to indicate that they speak in a particular kind of way or that they say particular kinds of things.

example.ex: I've always had a loud mouth, I refuse to be silenced...
example.tran: 我一贯大声说出自己的想法，不会迫于压力而一言不发。

example.ex: You've got such a crude mouth!

entry.def: The mouth of a cave, hole, or bottle is its entrance or opening.

example.ex: By the mouth of the tunnel he bent to retie his lace.
example.tran: 到隧道出入口时，他弯腰重新系好鞋带。

entry.def: The mouth of a river is the place where it flows into the sea.

example.ex: ...the town at the mouth of the River Dart.
example.tran: 位于达特河入海口的城镇

entry.tran: 不出声地说;用口型默示
entry.def: If you mouth something, you form words with your lips without making any sound.

example.ex: I mouthed a goodbye and hurried in behind Momma...
example.tran: 我用口型默示告别，然后匆匆跟在妈妈身后走了进去。

example.ex: She winked broadly at him and silently mouthed something...
example.tran: 她使劲冲他使眼色，不出声地对他说了些什么。

entry.tran: 言不由衷地说；信口说；不知所云地说
entry.def: If you mouth something, you say it, especially without believing it or without understanding it.

example.tran: 我言不由衷地说了一些表示同情的客套话。

example.ex: They mouthed the values of family, religion and charity, but demonstrated the opposite in their private lives.
example.tran: 他们大谈家庭、宗教和慈善的价值，但他们在个人生活中的表现却恰恰相反。

entry.tran: 需要赡养的人;要养活的人
entry.def: If you have a number of mouths to feed, you have the responsibility of earning enough money to feed and look after that number of people.

example.ex: He had to feed his family on the equivalent of four hundred pounds a month and, with five mouths to feed, he found this very hard.
example.tran: 他要用相当于400英镑的月收入来维持五口之家的生计，感觉很艰难。

entry.def: If you say that someone does not open their mouth, you are emphasizing that they never say anything at all.

example.ex: Sometimes I hardly dare open my mouth...
example.tran: 有时我几乎不敢开口说话。

example.ex: He hasn't opened his mouth since he's been there.
example.tran: 他从到那儿后一直没有开口。

entry.def: If you keep your mouth shut about something, you do not talk about it, especially because it is a secret.

example.ex: You wouldn't be here now if she'd kept her mouth shut.
example.tran: 如果她守口如瓶的话，你现在就不会在这儿啦。

means.word_mean: 1. the opening through which food is taken in and vocalizations emerge;
2. the externally visible part of the oral cavity on the face and the system of organs surrounding the opening;
3. an opening that resembles a mouth (as of a cave or a gorge);

sentences.sentence: "he rode into the mouth of the canyon"
"they built a fire at the mouth of the cave"

means.word_mean: 4. the point where a stream issues into a larger body of water;

sentences.sentence: "New York is at the mouth of the Hudson"

means.word_mean: 5. a person conceived as a consumer of food;

sentences.sentence: "don't give me any of your sass"

means.word_mean: 8. the opening of a jar or bottle;
2. articulate silently; form words with the lips only;

slang.tokens: Do you eat with that mouth? (=You eat with that mouth?)

list.explanation: (指说下流话、脏话)你说得出口？

example.en: That's a lot of foul talk. Do you eat with that mouth?
example.zh: 那么一大堆下流话。你竟说得出口？

example.en: You talk dirt a lot. You eat with that mouth?
example.zh: 你脏话连篇。你说得出口?

example.en: Stop shooting your mouth off. Nobody believes you any more.
example.zh: 别再瞎吹了。没人再相信你了。

auth_sentence.content: My mouth dried up and I couldn't swallow.
auth_sentence.res_content: My mouth dried up and I couldn't swallow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My mouth dried up and I couldn't swallow.

auth_sentence.res_content: Mouth breathing causes a dry mouth and cracked lips.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mouth breathing causes a dry mouth and cracked lips.

auth_sentence.content: Pipe black eyes and mouth then leave to set.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pipe black eyes and mouth then leave to set.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pipe black eyes and mouth then leave to set.

Sentence.sentence: This means that there could be an extra three billion mouths to feed by the end of the century, a period in which substantial changes are anticipated in the wealth, calorie intake and dietary preferences of people in developing countries across the world.

sentences.en: Don't speak with your mouth full.
sentences.cn: 当嘴里塞满东西时不要讲话。

sentences.en: I don't want any mouth from you!
He is the mouth of the House.

means.word_mean: (嘴)做出说[唱]…的动作 (但不出声)，（动嘴唇）不出声地说

sentences.en: The actor mouthed the words of the recorded song.
sentences.cn: 演员不出声地哼着那首已经事先录好音的歌曲。

means.word_mean: 喃喃地说, 心不在焉地说, 言不由衷地说

sentences.en: He was mouthing the usual platitudes about the need for more compassion.
sentences.cn: 他言不由衷地说些需要更加同情之类的陈腔滥调。

jushi.english: He is the mouth of the House in its relations with the crown.
jushi.chinese: 他是议会对皇室的发言人。

jushi.english: The news spread rapidly from mouth to mouth.
Don't speak with your mouth full.
jushi.chinese: 嘴里塞满东西时不要讲话。
